metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19655 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
A stack-based buffer overflow in the find_green() function of dcraw through9.28, as used in ufraw-batch and many other products, may allow a remoteattacker to cause a control-flow hijack, denial-of-service, or unspecifiedother impact via a maliciously crafted raw photo file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19655` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dcraw - 9.28-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dcraw package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.28-2').
